resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104610</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104610</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206350</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thaw in the Cold War: Eisenhower and Khrushchev at Gettysburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tauwetter im kalten Krieg: Eisenhower und 
Khrushchev bei Gettysburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dégel dans la guerre froide : Eisenhower et
Khrushchev chez Gettysburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Thaw na guerra fria: Eisenhower e Khrushchev
em Gettysburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disgelo nella guerra fredda: Eisenhower e 
Khrushchev a Gettysburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Thaw στον ψυχρό πόλεμο: Θ*Εησενχοωερ και 
Khrushchev σε Gettysburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deshielo en la guerra fría: Eisenhower y 
Khrushchev en Gettysburg</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes how President Eisenhower's personal diplomacy at his Gettysburg farm helped ease the tensions of the Cold War. The site offers photos and maps of the home as well as readings and suggestions for student assignments.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt wie Präsident Eisenhowers persönliche
Diplomatie an seiner Gettysburg Bauernhof geholfenen Mühelosigkeit 
die Spannkräfte des kalten Krieges. Die Site bietet Fotos und 
Karten des Hauses sowie Messwerte und Vorschläge für 
Kursteilnehmeranweisungen an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit comment diplomatie personnelle du 
Président Eisenhower's à sa aise aidée par ferme de Gettysburg les 
tensions de la guerre froide. Le site offre des photos et des 
cartes de la maison aussi bien que des lectures et des suggestions 
pour des affectations d'étudiant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve como diplomacy pessoal do presidente 
Eisenhower em sua facilidade ajudada fazenda de Gettysburg as tensões
da guerra fria. O local oferece fotos e mapas da HOME as.well.as
leituras e sugestões para atribuições do estudante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive come la diplomazia personale del 
presidente Eisenhower alla sua facilità aiutata podere di Gettysburg 
i tensionamenti della guerra fredda. Il luogo offre le foto ed i
programmi della sede così come le letture ed i suggerimenti per le 
assegnazioni dell'allievo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει πώς προσωπική διπλωματία Προέδρου 
Eisenhower στο αγρόκτημα Gettysburg του που ενισχύεται να 
διευκολύνει τις εντάσεις του ψυχρού πολέμου. Η περιοχή 
προσφέρει τις φωτογραφίες και τους χάρτες του σπιτιού καθώς 
επίσης και των αναγνώσεων και των προτάσεων για τις αναθέσεις 
σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe cómo diplomacia personal de presidente 
Eisenhower en su facilidad ayudada granja de Gettysburg las tensiones 
de la guerra fría. El sitio ofrece las fotos y las 
correspondencias del hogar así como lecturas y sugerencias para las 
asignaciones del estudiante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206350</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104610</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/thaw-in-the-cold-war-eisenhower-and-khrushchev-at-gettysburg</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
